root.name: mult()
root.description: Multiplies a vector by a scalar or multiplies one vector by another.
root.syntax: vec.mult(scalar) vec.mult(v) PVector.mult(v, scalar) PVector.mult(v1, v2)

parameter.label: scalar
parameter.description: float: the number to multiply with the vector

parameter.label: v
parameter.description: PVector: the vector to multiply by the scalar

parameter.label: v1
parameter.description: PVector: the x, y, and z components of a PVector object

parameter.label: v2
parameter.description: PVector: the x, y, and z components of a PVector object
